>

>
> The textui works fine but the swinggui does not.
> Thanks for any help as I enjoy the greeen bar.
> Stuart.

I (mis?)use the static constructor to initialize log4j1.2.7
in my testclasses:

static {
BasicConfigurator.resetConfiguration();
BasicConfigurator.configure();

// disable all log4j output
Logger logger = Logger.getLogger("x");
LoggerRepository lr = logger.getLoggerRepository();
lr.setThreshold(Level.OFF);
}

I added this to avoid duplicate log4j output, maybe it is not related to
your problem at al?

Bernd
